name: Dungneon
description:
Hello! this game was made for Amaze Me Game Jam!

This is also my first game! 

DungNeon is about a gigantic tower where hostile creatures try to destroy you while you try to climb as high as possible. surviving in this adventure will not be easy...

The main mechanic is based on you using the recoil of your weapons to your advantage, being able to shoot down and pick up momentum.

The game's aesthetic will always be based on three colors, black, white and a color whose building will choose.

(very inspired by downwell and nitrome must die)

I appreciate it so much if you can play it and rate it :D
